properties.name: review.generation.thread-pool-size
properties.description: Size of the thread pool for processing review generation tasks.

properties.name: review.generation.max-characters-to-remove
properties.description: Maximum number of characters to remove iteratively from the model name.

properties.name: review.generation.number-of-results
properties.description: Number of search results to fetch from Google.

properties.name: review.generation.preferred-domains
properties.description: List of preferred domains that must be present in search results.
